name: Aether (itch) (Benilde GameDev)
description:
NOTE: Need controller.

It's the year 20xx and almost all of earth's natural resources have been used and everything is now powered by Aether, a mysterious energy source that can be formed into crystals. TerraCorp is the leading provider of Aether. You are part of the Aether Research Foundation for Safe Energy, tasked to find a way to develop a sustainable source of Aether. While on your mission, you discover that TerraCorp's minions have been harvesting Aether illegally.

Year and term of capstone:
Capstone1, Term 1, 2017-2018

Team members:
Javi Arnaldo
Gaston Dualan
Jaromir Enriquez
Arthur Kyle Estuar
Jae Ener Pedrina

Recognition:
GameOn 2018 Nominee for Best in Gameplay and Best in Game Art
